name: Can You Survive a Racism: Medical Industrial COMPLEX-Full Game
name_original: Can You Survive a Racism: Medical Industrial COMPLEX-Full Game
description: Can You Survive a Racism: Industrial Medical COMPLEX is a text based adventure game. The goal is to make an appointment, go to the doctor and receive appropriate treatment. Should be easy right? But is anything easy in a country that supports systems of oppression? Play the full game here!
